title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jun 24 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jun 24 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2: Compromise on infrastructure bill? Building collapse in Miami. Terrifying: New York court suspends Rudy Giuliani's law license over "false statements" about 2020 election. Deep State goes after Rudy for essentially making a case for a client. Police state tactics used against Trump and his orbit. Andrew Giuliani on blatantly political ruling. Psaki bomb: Doocy questions press secretary on low police morale and she blames Republicans! The Deep State is now The State, because they're in charge of everything. Callers on Rudy outrage. Joy Behar is vaccinated but still afraid to go out with people. Clay has been banned from CNN four years ago for saying the First Amendment and boobs never let him down.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
